canvas_sdk.methods.announcement_external_feeds module¶

canvas_sdk.methods.announcement_external_feeds.create_external_feed_courses(request_ctx, course_id, url, verbosity, header_match=None, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

Create a new external feed for the course or group.

param request_ctx:
 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext
param course_id:
 (required) ID
type course_id:string
param url:(required) The url to the external rss or atom feed
type url:string
param verbosity:
 (required) no description
type verbosity:string
param header_match:
 (optional) If given, only feed entries that contain this string in their title will be imported
type header_match:
 boolean or None
return:Create an external feed
rtype:requests.Response (with ExternalFeed data)

canvas_sdk.methods.announcement_external_feeds.list_external_feeds_courses(request_ctx, course_id, per_page=None, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext

 (required) ID
